headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://esm.sh https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com; frame-src 'none';
